thread.title: Where to Watch Super Bowl LI in Seattle
thread.title_full: Where to Watch Super Bowl LI in Seattle

author: Eater Staff
title: Where to Watch Super Bowl LI in Seattle
text:
Where to Watch Super Bowl LI in Seattle All Jan 31, 2017, 11:30am PST Shutterstock 
These days it feels like many bars and their patrons are deliberately shying away from television sets, preferring to foster the sounds of quiet conversation or hip Spotify playlists rather than the inescapable din of talking heads and car commercials. 
But NFL football season carries on, Super Bowl LI (or Super Bowl 51, for the non-Romans) is fast approaching, and even if you don't particularly care for the Atlanta Falcons, you're still going to root for them to dismantle Trump's buddy Tom Brady and the New England Patriots. 
Here's a map to some of Seattle's top bars where you can watch sports, with TVs galore to satisfy your gridiron needs. 
Note: Map points are ordered geographically and are not ranked by preference. Have you found another great bar dedicated to the spirit of televised competition? Show it some love in the comments, send an , or start a forum thread in its honor. 1 The Westy 
This "not just a sports bar" boasts 16 TVs, pub grub, and a nice cocktail selection. 7808 35th Ave SW
